extensionDescription.message: Gopass Bridge allows searching and inserting login credentials from the gopass password manager.

createNewEntryButtonText.description: Text of create new entry button

copiedToClipboardMessage.description: Text to display when an entry was copied to clipboard

couldNotDetermineUsernameMessage.description: shown when no username in response does not match current domain

authLoginDescription.description: description on basic auth login popup, url will be appended

authLoginOptionsInfo.message: (this can be disabled in the browser extension options)
authLoginOptionsInfo.description: info that basic auth handling can be disabled in options

createPasswordAutogeneratePlaceholder.description: password placeholder when autogeneration is used

createPasswordPlaceholder.description: password placeholder when input is used

optionsChangelogText.message: Changes can be found in the Github Changelog.

optionsUsageHintsClipboardText.message: To copy the secret to clipboard, hold shift key while clicking on the secret.

optionsUsageHintsDetailsText.message: To show the full entry, hold Alt key while clicking on the secret.

optionsUsageHintsKeyboardShortcutText.message: Ctrl+Shift+U or Cmd+Shift+U can be used as a keyboard shortcut.

optionsMarkFieldsLabel.message: Mark fields blue when recognized as user and password input

optionsSendNotificationsLabel.message: Allow to send notifications if necessary

optionsLoginAfterFillLabel.description: label of login after fill checkbox

optionsHandleAuthRequestsLabel.message: Provide credentials for basic auth requests
optionsHandleAuthRequestsLabel.description: label of handle auth requests checkbox

noResultsForMessage.description: Message shown if no results are found

noURLInEntry.description: Shown when no url attribute in entry and page is loaded

cannotHandleMultipleAuthRequests.message: Previous authentication is still in progress, please close all popups and try again.
cannotHandleMultipleAuthRequests.description: Error when another basic authentication popup is already open

correctlySetup.message: Is your browser correctly set up for gopass?
correctlySetup.description: Error when gopassbridge is not correctly setup
